verses.name: Numbers 7:11
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, They shall offer their offering, each prince on his day, for the dedicating of the altar.

verses.name: Numbers 7:12
verses.text: And he that offered his offering the first day was Nahshon the son of Amminadab, of the tribe of Judah:

verses.name: Numbers 7:13
verses.text: And his offering was one silver charger, the weight thereof was an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them were full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:14
verses.text: One spoon of ten shekels of gold, full of incense:
